name: Odyseus
goal:
Our mission is to participate in human rights monitoring and increasing the quality of life of vulnerable communities, mainly:
- people using drugs
- sex workers
- young people

and to help them to regain their equal status in society.

Our vision is that people who use drugs, sex workers, young people and other threatened communities will be equal members of the society and will actively take part in the life and policy of the state. Help and support systems will be created within the framework of the communities to prevent crisis situations and to fulfill their membersÂ´ needs.
interests: Employment and Social Affairs, Public Health
euInitiatives:
- advocating human right of the vulnerable communities and public health (national and international level)
- membership in HIV/AIDS Civil Society Forum
- membership in The Eurasian Harm reduction network Steering Committee (subregion of Central Europe)
